Plot: In New Jersey in 1935, a movie character walks off the screen and into the real world.
Title: The Purple Rose of Cairo
Actors: Mia Farrow, Jeff Daniels, Danny Aiello, Irving Metzman
tomatoConsensus: Lighthearted and sweet, The Purple Rose of Cairo stands as one of Woody Allen's more inventive -- and enchantingly whimsical -- pictures.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 14 wins & 14 nominations.
